desc: I am Dr. Monique May, Board-certified Family Physician and Founder of Physician in the Kitchen™. Through my meal delivery service, cookbooks, and cooking utensils I help busy households enjoy healthy eating without impacting their hectic schedules. The Physician in the Kitchen will feed you now!

layout.text: Meal Masters: Your Simple Guide to Modern-Day Meal Planning
Easy, helpful tips for the busy household!
